item.title: Bally's 因涉及芝加哥赌场的债务计划而面临贷款人的愤怒
item.description: Bally's Corp. 正与其贷款人僵持不下，这场争斗可能会对这家被评为垃圾级的赌场运营商和芝加哥资金不足的养老金计划造成影响。【原文：Bally’s Corp. is in a standoff with its lenders, a battle that could have consequences for the junk-rated casino operator and Chicago’s underfunded pension plans.】

item.title: 贝森特表示将在 12 月为特朗普提供美联储主席人选
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他将在 12 月向唐纳德-特朗普总统提交一份美联储下任主席候选人名单。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he would present President Donald Trump with a list of candidates to serve as the next chair of the Federal Reserve in December.】

item.title: 南非乡镇企业因缺乏信贷和规模而受困
item.description: 南非是世界上收入不平等程度最严重的国家之一，其乡镇企业主要由黑人多数拥有，这些企业正在挣扎求存。【原文：South Africa’s township businesses, predominately owned by the Black majority in a nation with one of the world’s widest levels of income inequality, are struggling to survive.】

item.title: 竞争对手削减准备金，摩根大通在信用问题上独树一帜
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.其他华尔街银行似乎并不那么担心。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. set aside the most money for loan losses since the height of the pandemic, matching CEO Jamie Dimon’s warnings about some cracks in credit quality. Other Wall Street banks seem less concerned.】

item.title: SMBC 日兴首席执行官称与杰富瑞的股权合作是第一步
item.description: SMBC 日兴证券公司首席执行官表示，该公司与杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：SMBC Nikko Securities Inc.’s planned integration with Jefferies Financial Group Inc. will likely go beyond just bringing together their equity businesses, with ties also possible in other investment banking areas, its chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 美国将支持与大选挂钩，阿根廷比索下滑，利率飙升
item.description: 阿根廷比索下跌，当地短期利率飙升，原因是美国最新的支持承诺引起了投资者的困惑。【原文：The Argentine peso dropped and short-term local interest rates soared as the latest pledge of support by the US generated confusion among investors.】

item.title: 沃尔玛美国首席执行官称购物者仍在健康消费
item.description: 沃尔玛公司美国首席执行官表示，尽管经济形势不明朗，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税也导致了一些通胀价格，但购物者的消费率保持健康，并仍有韧性。【原文：Walmart Inc.’s US CEO said shoppers are spending at a healthy rate and remain resilient, despite uncertain economic conditions and some inflationary prices due to President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 华尔街支持的初创公司推动在线贷款交易跃升
item.description: 一家由华尔街最大银行支持的初创公司正在为将电子交易引入最后的坚守者之一而努力。【原文：A startup backed by Wall Street’s biggest banks is making headway in a push to bring electronic trading to one of the final holdouts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔认为没有理由改变利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，目前没有理由改变利率，并警告说需要继续警惕某些通胀因素。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said there are currently no grounds to change interest rates, warning that some inflation components need continued vigilance.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促英国在与里夫斯的分歧中保持一年两次预测
item.description: 国际货币基金组织敦促英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）不要取消每年两次官方预测中的一次，尽管财政部担心目前的安排已变得不稳定。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has urged UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves not to scrap one of the two official forecasts made each year, despite concerns in the Treasury that the current arrangement has become destabilizing.】

item.title: 麻省理工学院毕业生兄弟受审，"狂野西部 "加密货币交易成焦点
item.description: 两兄弟都是麻省理工学院（Massachusetts Institute of Technology）的应届毕业生，他们本周将在一起案件中出庭受审，这起案件有望揭示一种神秘而有争议的加密货币交易策略。【原文：Two brothers, both recent Massachusetts Institute of Technology graduates, are going on trial this week in a case that promises to shed light on a secretive and controversial cryptocurrency trading strategy.】

item.title: 随着财务困境加剧，Kem One 债券持有人寻求团结一致
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，陷入困境的化工企业 Kem One SASU 债券的一组投资者正在要求其他债务持有人加入一项合作协议。【原文：A set of investors in distressed chemicals firm Kem One SASU’s bonds is asking other debtholders to join a cooperation agreement, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰称贸易不确定性令降息更迫切
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，近期的贸易紧张局势增加了经济增长前景的不确定性，使得决策者迅速降低利率变得更加重要。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said recent trade tensions have increased uncertainty in the outlook for growth, making it more important for policymakers to lower interest rates quickly.】

item.title: 印度愿意在贸易谈判中为美国石油支出 150 亿美元
item.description: 印度商务部一位高级官员周三表示，印度有能力从美国额外购买 150 亿美元的石油，这表明新德里有意加快贸易谈判并达成交易。【原文：India has the capacity to purchase an additional $15 billion of oil from the US, a senior commerce ministry official said Wednesday, signaling New Delhi’s intent to speed up trade talks and get a deal.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀率三年来首次降至 20% 以下
item.description: 尼日利亚的通货膨胀率三年来首次降至 20% 以下，这为决策者在下个月召开会议时再次降息提供了支持。【原文：Nigeria’s inflation rate dropped below 20% for the first time in three years, supporting the case for another interest-rate cut when policymakers meet next month.】

item.title: Meta 删除分享芝加哥 ICE 位置的 Facebook 群组
item.description: 在司法部提出要求后，Meta Platforms 公司删除了一个用于分享芝加哥移民与海关执法局特工信息的 Facebook 群组。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. removed a Facebook group used to share information about Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents in Chicago after a request from the Justice Department.】

item.title: AppLovin 撤下与意外应用程序下载指控有关的产品
item.description: AppLovin 公司称，该公司已关闭了一款与用户和做空者指控有关的产品，这些指控称有人未经同意将应用程序下载到手机上。【原文：AppLovin Corp. said it has shut down a product linked to user and short-seller allegations that apps were being downloaded to mobile phones without consent.】

item.title: 土耳其酝酿新任央行行长，阿克恰伊即将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，土耳其官员正在讨论在央行利率制定委员会一位最鹰派、对投资者最友好的成员明年退休前任命新的决策者。【原文：Turkish officials are discussing appointing new policymakers to the central bank’s rate-setting committee ahead of the retirement of one of its most hawkish and investor-friendly members next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行业稳健盈利盖过贸易战担忧，美国股市上涨
item.description: 由于大型银行的强劲盈利帮助投资者摆脱了对北京和华盛顿之间贸易战升级的担忧，周三股市反弹。【原文：Stocks rallied on Wednesday, as strong earnings from big banks helped investors shrug off fears around an escalating trade war between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 大亨本科因保险欺诈被判刑两年：法新社
item.description: 据法新社报道，雷内-本科因破产欺诈被奥地利法院判处两年监禁。【原文：Rene Benko was sentenced to two years in prison by an Austrian court for insolvency fraud, Agence France-Presse reported.】

item.title: 中英两国就对方使馆计划僵持不下
item.description: 就在基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的政府考虑是否让中国继续在伦敦新建一个超大型使馆之际，英国外交部负责人正在推动中国允许英国重建其驻北京大使馆。【原文：The head of the UK’s foreign office is pushing China to allow Britain to rebuild its embassy in Beijing, just as Keir Starmer’s government deliberates its own decision whether to let China go ahead with a new mega-embassy in London.】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料出口因炼油厂困境降至战时新低
item.description: 俄罗斯的精炼燃料出口量已跌至乌克兰战争爆发以来的最低点，这凸显了该国因基辅无人机袭击而成为目标的炼油厂所承受的持续压力。【原文：Russian exports of refined fuels have slumped to their lowest since the onset of the Ukraine war, underlining continued strain on the country’s refineries targeted by Kyiv’s drone attacks.】

item.title: 结成 OpenAI 联盟后，沃尔玛驶上万亿美元之路
item.description: 瑞穗（Mizuho）分析师大卫-贝林格（David Bellinger）表示，沃尔玛公司宣布与 OpenAI 建立合作关系后，其股价创下历史新高，有望加入估值达万亿美元的 "精英 "行列。【原文：Walmart Inc. is on track to join the “elite” crop of companies with a trillion-dollar valuation after its announced partnership with OpenAI powered the stock to a record high, according to Mizuho analyst David Bellinger.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，印度利率制定者因贸易不确定性而暂停行动
item.description: 印度央行周三的政策会议纪要显示，印度的利率制定者们一致同意让美国贸易和关税相关的不确定性过去，并让此前的降息完全生效。【原文：India’s rate-setters unanimously paused to let US trade and tariff related uncertainties pass and earlier interest rate cuts to fully take effect, minutes of the central bank’s policy meeting showed Wednesday.】

item.title: 民族国家黑客入侵网络公司 F5 Networks，窃取代码
item.description: 网络安全公司 F5 Inc. 周三表示，疑似民族国家的黑客入侵了该公司的网络，获得了对某些系统的 "长期、持久访问权限"，并窃取了一些源代码。【原文：The cybersecurity company F5 Inc. said Wednesday that suspected nation-state hackers breached its networks, gaining “long-term, persistent access” to certain systems and stealing some source code.】

item.title: 苹果更新 iPad Pro、MacBook Pro 和 Vision Pro，配备 M5 芯片
item.description: 苹果公司更新了其顶级产品 iPad Pro、Vision Pro 耳机和 14 英寸 MacBook Pro，在关键的假日购物季到来之前完成了一系列产品更新。【原文：Apple Inc. updated its top-of-the-line iPad Pro, Vision Pro headset and 14-inch MacBook Pro, rounding out a series of product refreshes ahead of the crucial holiday-shopping season.】

item.title: 波兰两位政策制定者发出谨慎信号：进一步降息
item.description: 由于存在通胀风险，两位波兰决策者敦促对进一步放宽货币政策采取更加谨慎的态度，这表明上周的降息可能会在 11 月份暂停。【原文：Two Polish policymakers urged more caution on further monetary easing because of inflation risks, signaling that last week’s interest-rate cut may be followed by a pause in November.】

item.title: 香港在优步推出十年后通过法案对其进行监管
item.description: 香港立法者周三通过了一项叫车服务法案，要求优步（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Hong Kong lawmakers on Wednesday passed a ride-hailing service bill requiring platforms such as Uber Technologies Inc. to be licensed.】

item.title: 加拿大工厂和批发销售额下降，贸易战造成的损失不断增加
item.description: 8 月份，加拿大制造业销售额下降了 1%，批发收入下降了 1.2%，凸显了美国关税对主要贸易暴露行业的影响。【原文：Canadian manufacturing sales fell 1% in August, while wholesale receipts dropped 1.2%, underscoring the impact of US tariffs on key trade-exposed sectors.】

item.title: 摩根大通与高盛一起在盈余后抛售高等级债券
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is selling investment-grade bonds in three parts on Wednesday, joining rival Goldman Sachs Group Inc. in raising debt after reporting third-quarter earnings.】
